short_summary: Supply of Medical Supplies and Equipment
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discoveryposting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 12, 2024 at 1400 EDT. All bids submitted after 1400 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============================

**Reference Number** | **5A316-226361**
-------------------|-------------------
**Solicitation Number** | **WS4519599596**
----------------------|------------------
**Publication Date** | **2024-04-29**
----------------unread | **2024-06-10T14:00:00** ( **CLOSING DATE EXTENDED - SEE BELOW**)

**Notice Type**
---------------|-------------------
**Request for Standing Offer** | **Demande d’offre à commandes**

**Procurement Category**
------------------------|---------------------
**Goods and Services** | **Services**

**Background**
------------

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada requires a Standing Offer for the supply of Medical Supplies and Equipment, on an as and when requested basis, for the Manitoba Region. The government is seeking a supplier to provide these goods and services.

**Key Information**
-------------------

*   **Goods and Services**: Medical Equipment and Accessories and Supplies
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **END User Entities**: Department of Indigenous Services (ISC)
*   **Trade Agreements**: CETA, CPPA, CCFTA, CPFTA, CKFTA, EU-GP, WCO, NAFTA, CFTA, Canada-Honduras FTA and others.
*   **Language**: French and English
*   **Contact Information**: Melanie Perrin, [melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important Updates**
---------------------

The closing time of the tender has been extended to **2024-06-12T14:00:00 EDT**. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted before this time. After this time, any late submissions will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Attachment and Notice URL**
---------------------------

*   **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19550531?extsite=MTk1NTA1MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Best regards,
*   May have notices contained details which are for a one-time offer, and can't be a standing offer.
*   Updates can be tracked, provides a common ground in the case of Standing offer. Because updates occur throughout the tender process
